resources.string:
1. Use any username for signup process in main page 
2. Enter any formula that you can remember according to your ease or select from given examples 
3. Put the given numbers in your formula and click check to first check the formula and then press confirm to make it the password for the entered username 
4. Use back to return to the main page 
5. Now using the username you created login in the main page. 
6. Now substitute the values to your equation and click submit 
7. If correct then you will be directed to a welcome page otherwise you have 4 chances to get your answer write 
8. If you cannot login then make another username and try again.
